description.spanish: Pierde durante el tutorial
description.japanese: チュートリアル中に負ける

displayName.japanese: ジャンプティ・ダンプティ

description.english: Hit a wolf key six times without touching the ground.
description.german: Drücke eine Wolfstaste sechs Mal, ohne den Boden zu berühren
description.french: Frappez une clé de loup à six reprises sans toucher le sol.
description.italian: Colpisci la chiave di un lupo sei volte senza toccare terra
description.koreana: 땅에 닿지 않고 늑대 등 뒤의 태엽 키를 여섯 번 치세요
description.spanish: Golpea una llave de lobo seis veces sin tocar el suelo
description.schinese: 在不落地的情况下攻击狼背后的钥匙六次
description.russian: Шесть раз ударить по волчьему ключу, не коснувшись земли.
description.japanese: オオカミのカギを、地面に触れることなく6回ヒットする
description.brazilian: Atinja uma chave da corda de um lobo seis vezes sem tocar o solo.

description.english: Complete the first level without skipping any cutscenes.
description.german: Schließe den ersten Level ab, ohne eine Zwischensequenz zu überspringen
description.french: Terminez le premier niveau sans passer une seule cinématique.
description.italian: Completa il primo livello senza saltare nessuna cutscene
description.koreana: 컷신을 건너뛰지 않고 첫 레벨을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa el primer nivel sin saltarte ninguna escena
description.schinese: 在不跳过任何过场动画的情况下，完成第一关
description.russian: Завершить первый уровень, не пропустив ни одной видеовставки.
description.japanese: カットシーンをスキップすることなく、最初のレベルを完了する
description.brazilian: Conclua a primeira fase sem pular nenhuma cena.

description.german: Drücke während einer Zwischensequenz 20 Mal die Überspringen-Taste
description.french: Appuyez 20 fois sur Passer pendant une même cinématique.
description.italian: Premi 20 volte il pulsante Salta durante una cutscene
description.spanish: Pulsa 20 veces el botón de saltar escena durante una misma escena
description.schinese: 在单个过场动画中按下20次“跳过动画”键
description.russian: Нажать кнопку «Пропустить» 20 раз за одну видеовставку.
description.japanese: カットシーン中にスキップボタンを20回押す
description.brazilian: Pressione o botão de pular 20 vezes durante uma cena.

displayName.german: Sieh nicht unter dem Bett nach
displayName.french: Ne jamais regarder sous son lit
displayName.spanish: No mires debajo de la cama

description.english: Explore the cave under the bed.
description.german: Erkunde die Höhle unter dem Bett
description.french: Explorez la grotte sous le lit.
description.italian: Addentrati nelle caverne sotto al letto.
description.spanish: Explora la cueva de debajo de la cama
description.japanese: ベッド下の洞窟を探検する
description.brazilian: Explore a caverna debaixo da cama.

description.spanish: Cose tus heridas 42 veces
description.japanese: 傷を42回縫い合わせる

displayName.japanese: 小さなおやゆびこぞう

description.english: Use a teleport mirror to go back.
description.french: Utilisez un miroir téléporteur pour revenir sur vos pas.
description.italian: Torna all'inizio con uno specchio di teletrasporto
description.spanish: Usa el espejo de teletransporte para volver
description.japanese: テレポートミラーを使って戻る
description.brazilian: Use um espelho de teletransporte para voltar ao primeiro deles.

displayName.brazilian: Para superar o medo, você precisa se tornar o medo

description.english: Use the bats as a flying bridge.
description.german: Benutze die Fledermäuse als fliegende Brücke
description.french: Utilisez les chauves-souris comme un pont volant.
description.italian: Usa i pipistrelli come un ponte volante
description.koreana: 박쥐를 공중에 떠 있는 다리처럼 사용하세요
description.spanish: Utiliza los murciélagos como puente volante
description.schinese: 使用蝙蝠搭一座空中桥梁
description.russian: Использовать летучих мышей как парящий мост.
description.japanese: コウモリを空飛ぶ橋として使う
description.brazilian: Use os morcegos como uma ponte voadora.

displayName.japanese: 柔らかい者も装備を付ければ危険な存在

description.spanish: ¡Equipa tu primera habilidad!
description.japanese: 最初のスキルを身に着ける

displayName.japanese: 僕はスパイダークマだ！

description.english: Defeat an enemy while hanging from a wall.
description.german: Besiege einen Gegner, während du hängst
description.french: Éliminez un ennemi en étant suspendu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nemico mentre sei appeso
description.spanish: Derrota a un enemigo mientras estás colgado
description.schinese: 在悬挂状态下击败一个敌人
description.russian: Победить врага, находясь в висячем положении.
description.japanese: ぶら下がりながら敵を撃破
description.brazilian: Derrote um inimigo com Teddy pendurado.

displayName.french: Vous voulez voir un tour de magie ?
displayName.brazilian: Que tal um truque de mágica?

description.english: Defeat a porcupine tank while it has its shield up.
description.german: Besiege ein Panzer-Stachelschwein, während sein Schild aktiv ist
description.french: Éliminez un char porc-épic protégé par son bouclier.
description.italian: Elimina un riccio-armato mentre ha l'armatura attiva
description.koreana: 방어 태세 중인 고슴도치 탱크를 무찌르세요
description.spanish: Derrota a un tanque-espín mientras tiene su escudo levantado
description.schinese: 在坦克豪猪举盾的状态下将其击败
description.japanese: シールドで防御しているヤマアラシ戦車を撃破
description.brazilian: Derrote um tanque porco-espinho enquanto ele estiver com o escudo ativado.

description.english: Dodge 9 lightnings at the last possible moment.
description.german: Weiche 9 Blitzen im letzten Moment aus
description.spanish: Esquiva 9 rayos en el último momento
description.schinese: 在千钧一发之际躲开9道闪电
description.russian: В последний момент увернуться от 9 молний.
description.japanese: 9つの稲妻をギリギリでかわす
description.brazilian: Esquive-se de 9 raios no último segundo.

displayName.japanese: コーヒーを頼んだのは誰だ？

description.english: Defeat 9 zombies by offering them some coffee.
description.german: Besiege 9 Zenzy-Zombies, indem du ihnen einen Kaffee anbietest
description.french: Éliminez 9 zombies en pain d’épice en leur servant un café.
description.italian: Elimina 9 biscotti zombie offrendo loro un caffè
description.spanish: Derrota a 9 zombis de jengibre ofreciéndoles café
description.schinese: 通过送咖啡的方式击败9只姜饼僵尸
description.japanese: ゼンジーゾンビ9体にコーヒーをあげて撃破
description.brazilian: Ofereça café a 9 biscoitos zumbis para derrotá-los.

description.english: Use your bow to defeat a zombie egg.
description.german: Besiege ein Zombie-Ei mit dem Bogen
description.french: Éliminez un œuf zombie avec votre arc.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un uovo zombie usando l’arco
description.spanish: Derrota a un huevo de zombi usando el arco
description.schinese: 使用弓箭消灭一只僵尸蛋
description.japanese: 弓を使ってゾンビの卵を撃破
description.brazilian: Use o arco para derrotar um ovo de zumbi.

displayName.english: I Don't Believe in Tooth Fairies!
displayName.french: Je ne crois plus aux fées des dents !
displayName.italian: Io non credo alle fatine dei denti!
displayName.spanish: ¡No creo en las hadas de los dientes!
displayName.schinese: 我才不信什么牙齿仙女！
displayName.russian: Я в зубных фей не верю!
displayName.japanese: 歯の妖精なんて信じない！
displayName.brazilian: Não acredito em fadas dos dentes!

description.spanish: Derrota a la reina de las hadas
description.japanese: 妖精の女王を撃破

displayName.english: Be Careful What You Wish For
displayName.german: Sei vorsichtig, was du dir wünschst
displayName.french: Attention à ce que vous souhaitez
displayName.spanish: Ten cuidado con lo que deseas

description.french: Exaucez tous les vœux de Sten.
description.italian: Esaudisci tutti i desideri di Sten
description.spanish: Cumple todos los deseos de Sten
description.japanese: ステンの願いをすべて叶える
description.brazilian: Realize todos os desejos do Sten.

description.english: Cut 33 poisonous apples on the fly!
description.french: Coupez 33 pommes empoisonnées en plein vol.
description.spanish: ¡Corta 33 manzanas venenosas en el aire!
description.schinese: 在飞行过程中切开33个毒苹果！
description.japanese: 飛び交っている毒入りりんごを33個切る

displayName.german: Sie kommen aus den Wänden heraus!
displayName.japanese: やつらは壁からやってくる！

description.english: Stop and fight during the speed test.
description.german: Halte an und kämpfe während des Geschwindigkeitstests
description.french: Arrêtez-vous pour combattre pendant l’épreuve de vitesse.
description.italian: Fermati e combatti durante la prova di velocità
description.spanish: Para y lucha durante la prueba de velocidad
description.schinese: 在速度测试中停下来与敌人战斗
description.russian: Дать бой во время испытания скорости.
description.japanese: スピードテストを中断して闘う
description.brazilian: Pare para lutar durante o teste de velocidade.

displayName.french: Je crois que ça me plaît

description.english: Listen to the fish woman's entire song.
description.german: Hör dir das ganze Lied der Fischfrau an
description.french: Écoutez la chanson de la femme-sardine jusqu’au bout.
description.italian: Ascolta tutta la canzone della donna pesce
description.spanish: Escucha toda la canción de la mujer pez
description.japanese: 魚女の歌を最後まで聞く
description.brazilian: Ouça a música toda da mulher-peixe.

displayName.english: The Good, The Bad, and the Ugly Duckling

displayName.brazilian: O bom, o mal e o patinho feio

description.english: Defeat all the rubber duck mini-bosses.

description.koreana: 미니 보스인 고무 오리를 모두 물리치세요

displayName.brazilian: Ouve ruídos estranhos no meio da noite?

description.english: Defeat all the phantoms in the castle.

displayName.german: Was für ein großes Messer du hast!

description.spanish: Derrota a la chica ensangrentada

displayName.french: Ce n’est pas la taille qui compte

description.english: Run away from the king and his giant wife.
